## Readings 

- For prediction, see QSS  4.1 (you can skip 4.1.1)
- For regression, see either MD Ch 5 or QSS 4.2 (you can skip 4.2.5). 

## Data

- For Thursday, you may want to install the `broom` package:

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
install.packages("broom")
```
:::
